alert.note: Alert for Grant; Jefferson; Lonoke; Pulaski (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 01 at 3:53PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Lonoke, east central Grant, northwestern Jefferson and southeastern Pulaski Counties through 430 PM CST... At 352 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Redfield, or 14 miles northeast of Sheridan, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... England... Redfield... Keo... Hensley Island... Pine Bluff Arsenal... Tucker... Bredlow Corner... Jefferson... Wright... Lock and Dam 5 Park... Kearney... Tar Camp Park... F.B. Baugh Recreation Area... Ferda... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CST for central and southeastern Arkansas.
